response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials, ensuring it exceeds expectations in terms of functionality and durability. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe its true value lies well above $8,000. However, I understand that every buyer has their own valuation criteria, so I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a limited-time offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 12000}
